AMD Radeon RX 6800 vs 6800 XT: 4K benchmarks

AMD Radeon RX 6800 vs 6800 XT: conclusion

Overall, then, it guarantee that both the RX 6800 and RX 6800 XT are both incredibly extremely efficient graphics playing cards, proper of filling out excessive refresh rate monitors at both 1080p and 1440p, and hitting consistent 60fps physique charges on Medium to Excessive settings at 4K.
